question: Which one of the following is true in context of Vanitha Mathil ? 1.It is a Women’s Wall to protect renaissance values. 2.It was formed on 1 January 2019 across the state of Kerala. 3.The wall extended for a distance of around 620 kilometers from Kasargod to Thiruvanathapuram.
explanation: Kerala government had on January 1st organized the Women’s Wall or Vanitha Mathil to protect renaissance values. Around thirty lakh women formed a human chain across the National Highway from Kasargod to Thiruvananthapuram.
